output.dependency: The name of the beer (column 2) describes the type of beer it is (column 3), indicating a semantic dependency.
The volume of the beer (column 4) has a dependency on the alcohol by volume (ABV) measurement (column 5), suggesting that certain types or volumes of beer tend to have certain ABV values.
The name of the brewery (column 8) indicates the location of the brewery (column 9), indicating a semantic dependency that all beers from that brewery are expected to come from the specified city.
The city where the brewery is located (column 9) corresponds to the state (column 10), indicating a semantic dependency that helps to identify geographical relationships.
The unique identifier (column 1) may relate to the category or inventory number (column 7), suggesting a potential syntactic dependency.
